name: Smoothie Planet Express
description:
This is a prototype submitted to the August Moonlight Game Jam.

Let me know if you enjoyed it and/or what you'd like to see done differently.

Have fun.

Story:

For your crimes you've been sent to a remote planet to make smoothies...

Think solo Overcooked crossed with Don't Starve.

Controls:

WASD + E for actions

Should also work with controllers using d-pad and x button for actions

The game has a tutorial built in
